code: @Bean @Qualifier("synch") public PlatformTransactionManager transactionManager1() {     return new CallCountingTransactionManager(). }

@Bean @NoSynch public PlatformTransactionManager transactionManager2() {     CallCountingTransactionManager tm = new CallCountingTransactionManager().     tm.setTransactionSynchronization(CallCountingTransactionManager.SYNCHRONIZATION_NEVER).     return tm. }
